items.text: short outside off, no pace as he mistimes a pull off the top-edge, drops short of deep midwicket running in
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 2 runs

items.preText: Zee: "I realize that Afghanistan haven't played the strongest opponents regularly, but, boy, it's such a luxury having someone average 20+ coming in at #9!"
items.text: slants across a full toss that's slapped over the in-field on the off side
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 2 runs

items.preText: "I am sure it will be final between India and Afghanistan," predicts Ashan.
items.text: very full outside off, tries to dig it out and hits the ground. Gets a change of bat
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: slogs at a full toss but it's pretty wide and out of his reach, gets a leading edge to third man
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, full and dipping outside leg stump, gets down to sweep and misses
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, 1 wide

items.text: and now he slants this too far across, past the keeper getting down to his right
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, 1 bye

items.text: wide yorker, gets under the bat
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: walks across and whips a very full ball past backward square leg's left
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, FOUR runs

items.text: full from around the wicket, drilled down the ground
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.preText: Krishna: "38 in 3 overs. Come on Afghanistan, you can do it"
items.text: comes down the ground and drills this wide of long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 2 runs

items.text: advances and chips it into the gap between mid-on and deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 2 runs

items.text: backs away to a full toss and carts it inside-out over cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.preText: Anil Kishore: "Rashid Khan turned 20 today. Happy Birthday! What a player! What a talent!! Any team he is a part of can proudly say 'Neighbor's envy, owner's pride'! "
items.text: advances and chips a full toss over mid-off's head. And the bowler has overstepped
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, (no ball) FOUR runs

items.text: swings at a full toss and finds the gap at deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 2 runs

items.text: backs away early, gives himself room, and slaps it over extra cover. Sensational batting
items.postText: Seventeen off that over; another huge one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, FOUR runs

items.preText: This is a record eighth-wicket partnership for Afghanistan record in ODIs.
items.text: shuffles across to paddle it fine but makes no decent contact as he hits it into the thigh and takes off as it rebounds back into the pitch. Hider runs forward and dives but doesn't find the stumps
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: chases a full one outside off and gets an inside edge to short fine leg
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: walks a couple of steps down and whips a full toss a couple of bounces to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 2 runs

items.text: full toss on leg stump, swats it away to long-off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: full toss, angled across, swings without getting close to it and misses
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: walks across to a full toss and wristily whips it in the air through backward square leg, deep midwicket sprints and just about manages to flick the ball back into the field of play
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, 2 runs

items.text: hoicks a length ball to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, angled into him, waits and swivels around to pull through backward square leg. The fielder in the deep sprints to his left and dives in front but the ball drops in front and goes past the boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, FOUR runs

items.text: advances to a length ball and pummels this off the middle through midwicket for an imperious boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, FOUR runs

items.text: backs away to a fuller one and drills it between long-on and long-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 2 runs
